description: Contextual Twit is an interactive application where users can search twitter for a hashtag and the application will do sentiment analysis on what was searched.
Up for beer review is an interactive application where users can review existing beers or users can also create new beers and review them.
Trail Scout is an interactive application where users can search for trails by city name and it also provides weather information for the trail.
Note taker is an application that helps users write notes with a title and text. The application also allows users to save and delete notes.
This application is used to generate a random password using certain criterias such as numbers, upper case letters, lower case letters, special characters, and character length.
Daily Planner is an application that helps users schedule events throughout the day. The application turns future time blocks green and passed ones grey.
This is an application that pulls weather data for any given city in the world. The application also displays a 5 day forecast.
Google Book Search is an application that allows user to search for any given book in the Google book database.
